item.title: VMware vCenter Server Appliance Error: VPXD must be stopped to perform this operation
item.description: While deploying a fresh vCenter Server 5.5 Appliance, I ran into an issue getting it configured. When the appliance is deployed, the first time you log in you get presented with the configuration wizard. The wizard clearly states that if you want to set a static ip, or hostname, you should cancel the wizard, do the network configuration and then re-run the wizard after the fact.
